name: As MACRO, so micro
description:
As MACRO, so micro is a first-person exploration game that is about a genius kid named Pax. He got for his birthday a strange chemistry set and a happy "little" accident shrinks him almost to microscopic levels!

Pax encounters a tardigrade civilization that is similar to the human civilization. He has to overcome many obstacles to collect "Tardelles", plants that fuel the growth pad and grow to a normal size again.
